name: AI Code Generator

on:
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  generate:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Run AI Code Generator
        run: |
          python ai-code.py ai-output.txt
